description.value:
With an emphatic gesture, you create waves that rush out from you in the shape of your hands. You either form two @Template[type:cone|distance:15]s that don't overlap or you combine the hands into one @Template[type:cone|distance:30]. Each creature in a wave takes @Damage[(floor((max(1,@actor.level)-1)/2)+1)d8[bludgeoning]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC. If a creature critically fails, you also push that creature 5 feet.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d8.
